text: Sarah Johnson (born 1980) is a South African poet. Sarah Johnson was born in Cape Town, and has lived there her entire life. She completed her MA in Creative Writing at the University of Cape Town, and published her first work, a collection of poetry, in 2004. Personae was described by Stephen Watson as 'one of the best debut volumes in recent years'. Poetry * Personae. (University of Cape Town, 2004) review ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:South African women poets Category:University of Cape Town alumni
title: Sarah Johnson (poet)
